text:
We had the wonderful opportunity to do terrariums with my kids, and it was an incredibly therapeutic experience, both for them and for me. The activity was a great way to connect with nature while exploring creativity.

The owners (kelvin, jack, and hui hui) were exceptionally kind and patient, guiding the kids every step of the way. They provided clear instructions and were genuinely invested in helping the kids refine and perfect their ideas. Their encouragement and support truly made the experience enjoyable and educational.

What stood out to me the most was seeing the spark of creativity in my kids as they brought their unique visions to life. Itâ€™s a fantastic activity for children to learn, grow, and express themselves.

Overall, I highly recommend this experience to anyone looking for an engaging, family-friendly activity. Kudos to the team for creating such a welcoming and inspiring environment!
Best and fun place for gathering with your family or friend. Staff were really friendly and helpful. Very beautiful workshop, highly recommend ðŸ¥°

Nice experience terrarium workshop.
Good place to go with family or friends come to join the workshop. They also selling moss and accessories so can buy it and do it yourself at home.
Had a wonderful session here. My children were able to complete it on their own. Staffs were really friendly and were able to give great guidance.
